job.title: IT Project Manager
job.description: Computer Enterprises Inc is looking for a strong Project Manager who has a background in software development and has the ability to lead development teams ltbrgtCEIs Managed Services practices focuses on longterm support efforts across development testing and infrastructure management arenas  Our practices seek to bring the right pricing model by extending our solutions across our delivery centers in the US India Peru and Spain  ltbrgtltbrgtResponsibilities will include the followingltbrgt	Personal billing as Project Manager commensurate with size of practice  pipelineltbrgt	Manage and hiring team members within geographic arealtbrgt	Training certification and productivity of team membersltbrgt	Assist local sales group with growing the practice through presales support technical credibility assessments qualificationltbrgt	Proposal management and development verify approach create estimates plan marketingltbrgt	Team member scheduling works with PMs  other Ops Dirs  VPltbrgt	PampL review and oversight for the delivery group in the regionltbrgtltbrgtDesired Skillsltbrgt	Previous experience managing offshore delivery teamsltbrgt	As at least 8 years experience as a project managerltbrgt	The ability to navigate conflict errors and unexpected roadblocks with poise and purposeltbrgt	Exposure to application management and ITILltbrgt	Must be a team leader people are inspired to followltbrgt	Eager to grow our service offeringltbrgt
